mapper.select: select distinct assign_detail from daily_tasks where assign_type='파트' and assign_date = #{date}
mapper.insert: insert into daily_tasks (daily_tasks_seq, input_task, assign_date, importance, assign_type, assign_detail, assigner_id, branch_seq, manual_tasks_seq) values(daily_tasks_seq.nextval, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
